Moves a source from point A to point B over a given duration.
If you want to move a source from its current position, you can use the command Math: Pull Source Value to find the current sourceâ€™s X and Y position and incorporate it into this command.

The higher your Receiver's FPS (max 60) the smoother the animation is going to be.
Box Name Type Description
scene String Scene name containing the source
source String Source name to move
Start X Real Starting X position
Start Y Real Starting Y position
Final X Real Final X position
Final Y Real Final Y position
Dur.(MS) Int Duration of the transition in milliseconds
Smooth dropdown Type of transition.
None = Normal, Out = Starts out fast and ends slow, In = Starts out slow and ends fast,
In/Out= Starts out slow, gets faster and then slows down at the end again.
